content.question: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops your position on the extent to which rewilding initiatives are worthwhile for urban communities to pursue.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops your position on the extent to which rewilding initiatives are worthwhile for urban communities to pursue.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Develop paragraphs comprised of a claim and evidence that supports the claim.
